name: Rehersal
description:
IMPORTANT: RUN IN FULLSCREEN

Description:

Explore the grotesque landscape that is our protagonist’s nightmare. Help him face his literal inner demons head-on, figure out why he’s having these recurring dreams, and to find the courage to confront his ultimate fear...

  • Interaction Stealth: F
  • Shout Key: E
  • Movement: W, A, S, D

Programming Team: Nic (Disc: imtrash#9516) & J (Disc: Dragometh#7104)

Artist: Audrey(Disc: audrey#3029)

Sound Design Team: Cody (Disc: Cody Mitchell#3602)& Abysian(Disc: Abysian#117)
